name: Fudgy & Chewy Brownie Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F and line baking sheet with parchment
Mix powdered sugar, cocoa powder, salt, and instant coffee
Add egg whites and vanilla to form thick glossy batter
Scoop 2-3 tbsp mounds spaced apart on baking sheet
Bake for 8-10 minutes (8 minutes for fudgy texture)
Cool, then use cup to gently round edges if desired
